name: EV Car Driving Car Games 2022
description:
Electric Car Simulator 2022 is the newest car simulator game that lets you feel the electric vehicles driving pleasure and power.
Drive next gen vehicles in an vast,detailed open world map.
Multiple cars are waiting you. They are realistic and detailed with cockpit view.
The next gen graphics are present in this game with day/night cycle and an immersive driving experience.
Multiple controls are available such as Buttons, Steering Wheel or Tilt.
Tired of always driving in summer? No problem, you can switch to winter!
Music tracks are available, enjoy listening to cool music while driving!
Explore big cities, highways, off road tracks or even sand roads!

Features:
- Realistic cars with interior
- Next-gen realistic graphics with day/night cycle and rainy weather
- Realistic map with beautiful sceneries
- Great physics
- Charging stations
- Interior lights
- Multiple control options(Gyro, Buttons, Steering Wheel)
- Different camera views
- Minimap
- First person walk mode
